p: Total RNA was extracted from individual samples by Direct-zol RNA MiniPrep Plus kit (Zymoresearch, Irvine, CA, USA) according to manufacturer’s protocol. Concentration of DNA-digested RNAs was measured by NanoDrop™ One Microvolume UV-Vis Spectrophotometer (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA). The cDNA library preparation for RNASeq and small RNASeq, and sequencing on illumina HiSeq 4000 was performed by GENEWIZ (South Plainfield, NJ, USA).
